The chemical entity in the paragraph is "indinavir". It is a medication used to treat HIV infection and AIDS. It is mentioned as the object of the study on steady-state pharmacokinetics in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

The only chemical entity in the paragraph is "indinavir". Other terms such as "steady-state pharmacokinetics" and "week 4" are not chemical entities. "Week 4" refers to a time point in the study and "steady-state pharmacokinetics" is a term used to describe the behavior of a drug in the body after it has reached a steady state.
